attributes.action: Rising population Action before Catastrophic Outcome
attributes.additional_details:
Can anybody see the problem with rising population
or is it just me.
1' If population continues to rise we can only expect a catastrophic outcome, We already have food banks on the increase, And a massive shortage of Housing
With an increase in population, We will have a greater
older population which brings its own problems as with care. Also we will need greater strains on the health service.
 We need to start controlling population before we lose control. I know there will be hard choices to be made . But Just step back and look what is happening now then work out what the future holds
Politicians Need to discus this now Before we lose control and watch our entire country collapse.
